Name: QuickFix
Pickup: Increases bonus health and regen gains. Does not benefit from leveling up bonuses. Full of minerals.
Description: Increases bonus health and regeneration gains by 50% (+15% per stack). Does not affect bonuses from leveling up.

Name: CookedSteak
Pickup: Gain 50 max health plus a percentage of your max health. Cooked to perfection.
Description: Increases maximum health by 50 (+50 per stack), plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of your max health.

Name: Stew
Pickup: Increases health regeneration and converts it into damage at full health. A single sip leaves you feeling warm and fuzzy inside.
Description: Increases regeneration by +2.5 (+2.5 per stack) HP/s. At full health, your regeneration is added to your base damage.

Name: UltimateMeal
Pickup: At full health, you become lucky. The pinnacle of culinary arts.
Description: At full health, all random effects are rolled +2 (+2 per stack) extra times for a better outcome.

Name: WyrmOnHitDisplay
Pickup: Chance on hit to summon a spectral wyrm that seeks out and damages enemies. Tastes like glass frogs and starseed.
Description: On hit, 10% chance to summon a spectral wyrm that seeks out and damages and ignites enemies for 500% (+500% per stack) TOTAL damage per second for 10 seconds.
